'Atomic' (officially [http://www.atomicsnow.com/en/Stories/AtomicCompany.aspx
Atomic Austria GmbH]) is an Austrian company which manufactures and sells skiing
equipment (skis, ski boots, bindings, helmets, ski poles, goggles and protective
equipment).
